Query: How to generate a random string?

Top-3 Similar Questions: so_59038617: Creating a custom random variable
so_40277918: Shell script to generate random hex numbers
so_29463778: How to create a bash variable like $RANDOM
Top-3 Scripts:
so_59038617: function RANDOM(){
    rando=$( head -100 /dev/urandom | tr -dc a-zA-Z0-9 | fold -w ${1:-15} | head -1 )
    echo $rando
}

RANDOM
RANDOM 4
RANDOM 40
